sentences.en: At Christmas it was customary for the children to perform bits of poetry.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节孩子们总要唱一些圣诞颂歌。

sentences.en: Barbara answered with her customary enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 芭芭拉以惯有的热情作了回答。

sentences.en: Do you really think it's customary to tip the waiters?
sentences.cn: 你真的认为给侍者小费是约定俗成的吗？

sentences.en: He held himself erect , and his face wore its customary sardonic smile.
sentences.cn: 他挺直了身体, 依旧冷冷地微笑.

sentences.en: He makes his customary visit every week.
sentences.cn: 他每星期都按照惯例造访一次.

sentences.en: In some cultures it is customary for the bride to wear white.
sentences.cn: 在一些文化中，新娘按风俗要穿白色。

sentences.en: In the UK, it is customary for the next heir to the throne to be regent.
sentences.cn: 在英国, 通常由下一位王位继承人摄政.

sentences.en: Is it customary to tip waiters in your country?
sentences.cn: 在贵国依照惯例是否应该付给服务员小费?

sentences.en: It is customary for the teacher to provide grammar notes to help the student generalise what he has learned.
sentences.cn: 教师经常给学生提供语法注释,帮助他归纳所学到的东西.

sentences.en: It is customary for the teacher to provide grammar notes to help the student generalize what he has learned.
sentences.cn: 教师经常给学生提供语法注释，帮助他归纳所学到的东西。

sentences.en: It is customary to think of three general types of wound union.
sentences.cn: 通常认为伤口愈合可分为三大类.

sentences.en: She found her customary self-possession had deserted her.
sentences.cn: 她发现自己不像平时那样处事不惊了。

sentences.en: The king carried himself with his customary elegance.
sentences.cn: 国王保持着一贯的温文尔雅。

sentences.en: The scene within was not quite the customary one.
sentences.cn: 里面的光景,很有些不同往日.

sentences.en: They interrupted the customary one minute's silence with jeers and shouts.
sentences.cn: 他们讥讽着，喊叫着，打破了惯常的那一分钟沉默。

sentences.en: Writing - rooms , smoking - rooms , dining - rooms , all the customary facilities, were improvised and primitive.
sentences.cn: 办公室 、 吸烟室 、 饭厅 以及 所用常用的设备都是因陋就简.

sentences.en: Yvonne took her customary seat behind her desk.
sentences.cn: 伊冯娜坐在桌子后面那个她常坐的位子上。

trans.tran_cn: 习俗的，习惯的，（某人）特有的
trans.tran_en: something that is customary is normal because it is the way something is usually done
